title: Rashmi
extract: Rashmi or Rashami (Hindi: रश्मि) is a Hindu/Sanskrit Indian feminine given name, which means a single 'ray of light'. May also be used as a male name.
extract_html: Rashmi or Rashami (Hindi: रश्मि) is a Hindu/Sanskrit Indian feminine given name, which means a single 'ray of light'. May also be used as a male name.
